title: Real-time Customer Analytics Pipeline
description: Built a comprehensive real-time analytics pipeline processing 1M+ events per day using Apache Kafka, Spark Streaming, and Google BigQuery. Implemented automated data quality checks and monitoring dashboards that reduced data processing latency by 60%. The system handles customer behavior tracking, purchase analytics, and real-time personalization recommendations.

title: MLOps Platform for Credit Risk Assessment
description: Designed and implemented an end-to-end MLOps platform for credit risk assessment models. Features automated model training, validation, deployment, and monitoring with A/B testing capabilities. Improved model deployment time from weeks to hours while maintaining 99.9% uptime. The platform serves 50+ ML models in production.

title: Data Lake Migration to Cloud
description: Led the migration of a 500TB on-premises data lake to Google Cloud Platform. Implemented comprehensive data governance, security frameworks, and cost optimization strategies. Achieved 40% cost reduction while improving query performance by 3x. The migration included 200+ data sources and zero downtime deployment.

title: Open Source ETL Framework
description: Created and maintain an open-source ETL framework that simplifies data pipeline development. Features include automatic schema evolution, data lineage tracking, built-in monitoring, and support for multiple data sources. Used by 50+ companies worldwide with 2000+ GitHub stars. The framework reduces pipeline development time by 70%.

title: Stream Processing Platform for IoT Data
description: Built a scalable stream processing platform handling 10M+ IoT sensor readings per minute. Implemented real-time anomaly detection, predictive maintenance alerts, and automated data quality monitoring. The platform reduced equipment downtime by 35% and processes data from 50,000+ connected devices.

title: Data Mesh Implementation for E-commerce
description: Implemented data mesh architecture for a large e-commerce platform, enabling decentralized data ownership across 15+ business domains. Built self-serve data infrastructure and automated data product deployment. Improved data discovery by 80% and reduced time-to-insight from weeks to hours.
